EmailTemplate.name: 02_ACCESS_Notify Contact/Lead Record Owner of Information access request-ENGLISH
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead_Routing__c.Lead_Name__c}'s Privacy Access Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear ,
We have received a SFDC request from a customer contact named {!Lead_Routing__c.Lead_Name__c} owned by you,
{!Lead_Routing__c.Product_Comments__c}
who has requested access to the personal information that DuPont has about him/ her.
In line with our privacy policy, we have informed the contact of the information about them that is currently stored in our databases.
There is no action required on your part as this communication serves to inform you about this request in the event that you would like to make a follow-up with the contact.
Sincerely,
DuPont Inquiry Management Center Toll-free number : 00800 3876 68 38 Phone : 0034 985 12 3773 Fax : 0034 912 72 52 37 E-mail: eu-info@dupont.com
